help. Cant proceed further. Pls help.

[1] is not active.
	at

You should try posting a message on the Eclipse newsgroups.

Follow this link:

http://eclipse.org/newsgroups

Get a password if you don't have one already then post in the eclipse.newcomer
or eclipse.platform group.

This bugzilla component is for reporting problems with the Eclipse mailing lists.
